p: The strategic location of the FS, at a road junction ( Fig 1), where there is an intense movement of people from all Brazilian regions including other northeast cities, may further the circulation of infected patients or of subjects in the incubation period of arboviruses (DENV, CHIKV, ZIKV), that allied to climatic conditions and the density of Aedes mosquitoes [ 7], may contribute to virus dispersion within the region and beyond.
